data.value: Current folder is invalid, please refresh your game folder!

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CREATE_NEW_VERSION_FILE
data.value: Are you sure you want to CREATE a version file name: "{0}.txt" ?
data.comment: 信息：你确定需要 创建一个版本文件为：”{文件名}.txt“

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CREATE_NEW_VERSION_INDEX
data.value: Create a new version index file.
data.comment: 信息：创建版本号文件

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_FOR_COPY_FILE
data.value: Are you sure you wanna copy current cheat?
data.comment: 信息：确认你要将这个金手指文件复制过去？

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_FOR_COPY_FOLDER
data.value: Are you sure you wanna copy current set of cheats?
data.comment: 信息：确认你要将整个金手指目录复制过去？

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_FOR_FORMAT_FILE_NAMES
data.value: Are you sure you wanna formulate file names?
data.comment: 信息：确认你将要套用规范模式名称？

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_TO_REMOVE_CURRENT_CHEAT_FOLDER
data.value: Are you sure to remove current game folder: {0}?
data.comment: 信息：你确定删除当前游戏所有金手指 ”{文件名}“？

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_TO_REMOVE_SELECTED_CHEAT
data.value: Are you sure to remove this selected cheat file: {0}?
data.comment: 信息：你确定删除已选的金手指：”{文件名}“？

data.name: DEFAULT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UPDATE_EXISTING_VERSION_FILE
data.value: Are you sure you want to UPDATE version file "{0}" => "{1}" ?
data.comment: 信息：你确定需要 更新一个版本文件从 ”{文件名0}“ 至 ”{文件名1}“ ？
